name: Ghost Hunters (itch)
description:
GHOST HUNTERS

A game about a scared ghost trying to escape a haunted house and the ghost hunters inside. Help our spooky friend by controlling the direction of the light, but don't let him get caught in it or he'll fade away!

Ghost Hunters is an exploration into PuzzleScript and an idea I had for a puzzle game. It is both my first stab at prototyping in PuzzleScript and creating a puzzle game. I attempt to create an engaging experience by introducing new concepts individually and gradually building on the complexity of them across 9 short levels.
